events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position through our online portal.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on keywords such as software and developer.
A recruiter specialized in engineering positions has been assigned to handle this candidate's hiring process.
The recruiter completed an initial screening call confirming the candidate's experience with relevant software development technologies.
The candidate responded positively to the initial screening and expressed enthusiasm for the next interview stages.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next week to assess software development skills.
